Day News.failure_impact: News site goes offline. Readers can't access content. Editorial team can't publish.
Day News.notes: Most important product. High traffic during news cycles.

GoEventCity.failure_impact: Event listings unavailable. Organizers can't manage events.
GoEventCity.notes: Traffic spikes around major local events.

Alphasite.failure_impact: Dev/staging environment down. No user impact.
Alphasite.notes: Can be more aggressive with automated fixes here.

Horizon.failure_impact: All background jobs stop: emails, notifications, scheduled tasks, data processing.
Horizon.notes: If Horizon is down, all Laravel apps lose async processing.
